mapper.sql: GRP_EMP_HST_CD /*그룹사원이력코드 */ , GRP_CD /*그룹코드 */ , EMP_ID /*사원ID */ , DEL_YN /*삭제여부 */ , REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , AMD_DT /*수정일시 */
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SYS_GRP_EMP_HST A INNER JOIN TB_SYS_GRP_BAS B ON A.GRP_CD = B.GRP_CD INNER JOIN TB_SYS_EMP_BAS C ON A.EMP_ID = C.EMP_ID INNER JOIN TB_SYS_ORG_BAS D ON C.ORG_ID = D.ORG_ID

SELECT A.GRP_EMP_HST_CD /*그룹사원이력코드 */ , A.GRP_CD /*그룹코드 */ , A.EMP_ID /*사원ID */ , A.DEL_YN /*삭제여부 */ , A.REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , A.REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , A.AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , A.AMD_DT /*수정일시 */ , B.GRP_NM , C.EMP_NM , D.ORG_NM FROM TB_SYS_GRP_EMP_HST A INNER JOIN TB_SYS_GRP_BAS B ON A.GRP_CD = B.GRP_CD INNER JOIN TB_SYS_EMP_BAS C ON A.EMP_ID = C.EMP_ID INNER JOIN TB_SYS_ORG_BAS D ON C.ORG_ID = D.ORG_ID
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
